paragraphs.title: Saving data as Parquet
paragraphs.text: %md Data for bank customers is provided in the file banks.csv. Load data from this file and save the data in Parquet format.

Load data from this file and save the data in Parquet format.

Load the data saved in the previous exercise into a dataframe, and display the list of records.

Load the data saved in the previous exercise into a dataframe, and display the list of records.

msg.data: Load the data saved in the previous exercise into a dataframe, and display the list of records.

paragraphs.title: Reading data from JSON file whose schema is known
paragraphs.text:
%md There is a data file called persons.json with the following fields:

Field Type
first_name character
last_name character
age integer

Read this data from the json by providing an appropriate schema and load it into a dataframe. Print the schema of the data frame, and list all the records.

msg.data:
There is a data file called persons.json with the following fields:

Field Type
first_name character
last_name character

Print the schema of the data frame, and list all the records.

name: Lab 1.3 - DataFrame - Exercise on Loading and Saving Data
